mapper.select: SELECT ai.UserID AS UserID, ai.NickName AS NickName, id.HeadHttp AS customFace FROM AccountsInfo ai LEFT JOIN IndividualDatum id ON ai.UserID = id.UserID WHERE ai.UserID = #{userId}

WITH temp(id, level) AS ( SELECT id, 0 AS level FROM [AdminManager].[dbo].[agency] WHERE id = #{agencyId} UNION ALL SELECT a.id, temp.level + 1 FROM [AdminManager].[dbo].[agency] a INNER JOIN temp ON a.parent_id = temp.id WHERE a.deleted = 0 OR a.deleted is null ) SELECT count(*) FROM AccountsInfo ai INNER JOIN temp t ON ai.SpreaderID = t.id
t.level <= #{level}
